title: Bone Marrow Aspirate Concentrate (BMAC)
tagline: Advanced Cellular Repair for Joints & Tendons
description: Concentrated bone marrow-derived cells that regenerate cartilage, tendons, and ligaments when standard therapies aren’t enough.
longDescription: BMAC harnesses stem-cell-rich bone marrow concentrate to rebuild tissue in severe degenerative joints or chronic tendon injuries. At Dr. SNA Clinic we aspirate marrow from the posterior hip, process it in a sterile centrifuge, and inject the concentrate precisely under ultrasound guidance. It’s our most powerful regenerative option for patients wanting to delay or avoid major surgery.

overview.title: Why Choose BMAC?
overview.content: Bone marrow contains mesenchymal stem cells, growth factors, and cytokines that promote deep tissue regeneration. BMAC is ideal when PRP or adipose therapy isn’t strong enough. We aspirate bone marrow from the iliac crest, concentrate it using lab-grade centrifuges, and inject it under ultrasound or fluoroscopy into joints, tendons, or discs.
highlights: Most powerful autologous therapy we offer
Effective for advanced osteoarthritis, labral tears, and spinal facet joints
Performed in sterile theatre with experienced consultants
Paired with structured rehab for lasting results

faq.question: Is the harvest painful?
faq.answer: We use local anaesthetic and offer conscious sedation. Most patients report mild soreness for 24-48 hours.

faq.question: How soon will I notice changes?
faq.answer: Expect gradual improvement from 6-12 weeks as collagen remodels and inflammation subsides.
